text: @Alyssa_Milano it's a bullshit virus!! People are NOT dying from the COVID-19. Why don't you put your riches down and put on a pare of scrubs and come to work with us and we will show you how people are NOT dying from COVID-19. THERES PLENTY OF SCIENCE BEHIND CORONAVIRUS CELLS. RIGHT FAUCI
